Name: Basault VR
About the game: BASAULT VR is a virtual reality movement shooter. Run, jump, swing around on your grappling hook and shoot with a variety of complex yet familiar firearms. Use those tools to survive and reach the end of this roguelite! *WARNING: do not play if you are prone to motion sickness* WAIT... WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO BE DOING? This game is a roguelite. Your goal is to survive a series of hand designed arenas against tough ennemies with your mobility and weaponry and reach the end of the cycle to unlock new Etheral Weapons! _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ...ETHERAL WEAPON? WHAT'S THAT? An Etheral Weapon is a special type of gun that you can always spawn from behind your hips. Whether your gun is empty, you dropped it off a cliff or you just want to dual wield because that's the kind of cool dude you are, you can pull out these single magazine weapons to get you out of a bind! _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 18 UNIQUE ARENAS... ...made for the sole purpose of shooting, running and swinging around in. _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 10 UNIQUE GUNS... ...and more to come. Enjoy the entirely physical reloading and handling! _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ THANK YOU Making this game alone would be quasi-impossible if it wasn't for the help of these people and ressources. Please look them up and give them some love by clicking on 'Visit the website' on the sidebar :)
